column1: Among the many public interest and public policy issues psychologists and others concerned with mental_health must tackle are the intrusion of corporate chains; the high costs and inconsistent quality of private sector services; the conflict between profit motivation and the motivation to provide care; and patient selection issues (e.g., cream-skimming).
